sections.section_text: If you've ever felt that you want a car that will meet your highest expectations, it will be ecological and dynamic at the same time, and will offer an interior you have never dreamed of. You've come to the right place. Vivace will touch your senses and Tograc will use them to travel without worries. Lose yourself in amazing details, the highest driving comfort and make your dreams come true with style.

Don't be afraid to go where your mind takes you. Our specialists have developed an AWD driveline and increased ground clearance to overcome all odds. High curbs will no longer be a problem for you and going to the mountains will become a pleasure. Feel free!

If you love the voice of a car exhaust, high speed, adrenaline, stiff suspension and enormous power, and inside you is a hidden racing driver ... then the car has found the perfect owner! Set track records and get the most out of the Cherrier! He loves it. Our racing experience has allowed us to create a version of the car that offers an amazing experience.

Take care of the world with electric versions of our models. Contribute to creating a more beautiful world. Make fuel expenses no longer a problem for you. All this thanks to our electric models for medium and long-range distance. Let your ears rest thanks to the sound-free ride and great noise reduction. Step into the future now!

ETK 800 was designed to give comfort, reliability, a beautiful line of the car. From the outside, we can enjoy a great design, a balance between an elegant appearance and a slightly sporty character. Inside, however, we will enjoy the soundproofing of the cabin, seats that will take care of us during a longer journey, safety systems, high-quality finish, spaciousness, a multimedia screen and a large trunk allowing for a long trip with many suitcases.

A precisely prepared engine will allow you to enjoy the dynamics of driving and a high work culture. For years, our experts have paid the greatest attention to the development of our cars. Driving dynamics was one of the most important features when we founded our company, so the ETK 800 offers not only first-class driving dynamics, but also a balance between comfort and speed. Clean diesel for long distances or gasoline for a bit shorter? The choice is yours.

Do you want to develop your passion and experience? Get more from driving than before and become a unique driver. With our ETK Driving Experience program, everything becomes possible. Gain much more skills in the field of safe and dynamic driving. Master extreme road conditions. Burn tires as you master the drift. Experience unforgettable emotions behind the wheel on the track and become a outstanding driver with us!

Our sport version of the ETK 800 is the essence of years of improving our technologies. ttSport offers an extraordinary sporty front and rear bumpers, AWD drive, a special ttSport+ mode that offers safety while squeezing the maximum out of the car, and Drift Mode that will allow you to quickly change from four-wheel drive to exciting rear-wheel drive.

If you've ever felt that you want a car that will meet your highest expectations, it will be ecological and dynamic at the same time, and will offer an interior you have never dreamed of. You've come to the right place. Vivace will touch your senses and Tograc will use them to travel without worries. Lose yourself in amazing details, the highest driving comfort and make your dreams come true with style.

Do you want to develop your passion and experience? Get more from driving than before and become a unique driver. With our ETK Driving Experience program, everything becomes possible. Gain much more skills in the field of safe and dynamic driving. Master extreme road conditions. Burn tires as you master the drift. Experience unforgettable emotions behind the wheel on the track and become a outstanding driver with us!

Every photo of your adventure will be perfect, as is the look of the ETK K Series. Feel special in the driver's seat and travel the world with comfort. Each route will be the essence of a perfect journey. You'll never be driving from A to B again because each ETK ride will mean so much more to you. Lose your senses in a perfectly designed interior. Let be lost in the pleasure of ETK K Series.

Our district is the highway. The opponents are fast and dangerous. Crime without limit. Risky service for our squad. Only thanks to a car like the ETK K Series can we do our best to prevent people from being in danger. We wouldn't be able to do it without a fast and safe car. ~ Semir Gerkhan

Imagine a luxury car, quite compact for its class. For now, you can see it through the fog, but with every second its precise body emerges. Everything fits together perfectly. You approach it, grab the door handle and hear that characteristic sound. You sit behind the wheel, the interior is so elegant, the seats are so comfortable, the steering wheel fits perfectly in your hands. You switch the ignition, perfection comes to life. Pleasant isn't it? Imaginations just got real with the new ETK I Series.

ETK I Series was created with German precision. The 6-cylinder in-line engine is able to generate up to 200 horsepower and its work culture will satisfy everyone. The automatic and manual gearbox in combination with the RWD or AWD will provide incredible driving accuracy and driving dynamics. It is also worth noting that the I Series has been equipped with additional safety systems, ranging from light wipers to airbags as standard. All this under a unique body created by specialists from ETK.

Do you want to develop your passion and experience? Get more from driving than before and become a unique driver. With our new ETK Driving Experience program, everything becomes possible. Gain much more skills in the field of safe and dynamic driving. Master extreme road conditions. Experience unforgettable emotions behind the wheel on the track and become a outstanding driver with us! Join to our ETK Driving Experience program now!

Based on ETK 2400ti TTSport Evolution, the successful track model with a convoluted name, speeds from victory to victory at 300km/h. It is all thanks to the great work of ETK specialists. Power, speed, grip, acceleration, low weight, performance and unique design. TTSport was made to stand on the top podium. This is the greatest achievement in racing technology.

For Hirochi, performance is a passion. We make sure that our cars are durable, reliable but, above all, extremely fast and dominant. Our newest car was created to share our passion with car lovers. Here is the Hirochi SBR4, shooting brake, rear mounted engine, for comfortale adults ultimate supercar with a 2.5L F4 engine combined with a twin turbo that is able to take you from 0 to 100 km/h in 3.4 seconds. And also brake back to zero at a distance of 35 meters.

The rear-mounted engine of the SBR4 generates 448 horsepower. To control such power, we have assembled it with a Dual Clutch Transmission gearbox which, in the selected configuration, transmits power to the AWD or RWD drive. SBR4 is ready for any competitive challenge, anyone, anywhere, anytime. We say it with full awareness because with our electronic system it is able to be the master of every road.

Thanks to our designers, the appearance of the SBR4 not only serves to look magnificent, because it is also a specially prepared body to generate huge downforce, with an active spoiler playing a huge role. It adjusts the type of altitude and inclination to our speed. This allows our supercar to accelerate to its top speed of 307 km/h.

HillClimb racing is characterized by high-powered cars that skillfully use high downforce to reach the pinnacle of performance. This is where the Hirochi SBR4 flexes its muscles and shows how wonderfully this car is constructed. The Hirochi SBR4 is more than a car, it is a technology-automotive romance created with the passion of car lovers.

Hopper goes beyond the limits. He deviates from the beaten path to be able to give a sense of freedom, happiness and overcome fear. With no other car you will experience so many unforgettable experiences while exploring so far unexplored paths. Tight city streets, suburbs and country roads, forests, sandy beaches, snow-covered areas, mountain trails, start making your dreams come true and experience the world from a different side with Hopper.

One of the greatest advantages of Hopper's adaptation to any conditions is the possibility of any customization. Found yourself on the beach and want to experience a beach buggy ride? Remove the roof and door and glide across the sand. Suddenly winter is here and you need a car with a metal roof? Just put on the hard top. Winter is gone and you are in the jungle and you want to be adapted to humidity, heat and wild creatures? Just put on the soft top and you are ready to explore the jungle surrounded by wild nature. It's all possible only with Hopper!

The Ibishu Hopper is a car that keeps your feet on the ground. The specially constructed live axle suspension will take care of you on bumpy terrain and the 4WD drive will provide maximum off-road traction. The frame-based design in combination with the 4 or 6-cylinder in-line Ibishu engines and the low weight allow the Hopper to always lead the way.

In a class of it’s own, Gavril Bluebuck 1962 stands alone. No other automobile offer so much of whats so many people desire. With styling thats bring u back to look and look again Bluebuck stands alone. Alone in pure and dedication to beauty and relaxation. Alone in jet smooth luction. Piece of space for freedom of movement in closed and styled car body. In a class of its own Gavril Bluebuck 1962 stands alone.

Gavril Bluebuck, shortcut to everywhere. This car on earth kiss softly with the ground. A steal coilover spring for each wheel is the jet smooth ride of every Bluebuck. Soft covered bucket seats in front, perfectly finished dashboard. It's time for you to take charge. Get the Bluebuck, a great highway performer.

We proudly present to you that Bluebuck has joined Roadsport family. Basic model has undergone a number of changes, from shaping the suspension for high-performance driving, through a complete change of interior, including seats and dashboard, as well as steering wheel. Bluebuck Roadsport equip a 423 cubic inch 'Ultra-Thrust' big-block V8 combined with 4-Speed ​​Sport Manual allows you to reach 60mph in 7.4s. The hunted becomes the hunter.

The engines we create are one of the best engines in the world, their power, work culture and sound are essence of a great vehicle. Their development in racing field is very important because it will allow us to map future of American cars that will never become boring. ~ Pete Burnside Jr.

Pigeon is a unique tricycle designed for local small businesses. Amazing small shape, light construction and available versions make it suitable in every corner of the world. It will easily squeeze through narrow side streets and traffic jams, delivering the most important loads for your company. Pigeon is more than a three-wheeled mini pickup truck. It's a car for a special missions. Get one today at your local Ibishu dealer.

The Ibishu Pigeon weighs so little that we had to limit its engine power to 27 horsepower and combine it with a 3-speed gearbox to ensure the safety of the transported goods. However, despite this, it is able to reach over 100 km / h in a short time. What's more, its aerodynamic shape and economical diesel engine allow it to burn a small amount of fuel on short and long trips. This is undeniably the best three-wheeled mini pickup truck ever.

Ibishu Pigeon is not only a car for small enterprises but also for towns and large cities where Pigeon equipped with weapons will bravely fight with litter on the streets. Its specially adapted version every day will protect us to keep the streets clean like never before. Pigeon to fight, defend, clean and polish but that's not all! Some of you have already seen Ibishu Pigeon equipped with real weapons fighting real criminals in America's busiest city. Stay tuned for more...

Thanks to its light weight, incredible aerodynamics, rocket power and most importantly, unique transport abilities, the Ibishu Pigeon is able not only to deliver goods as a tricycle on land but also as a space shuttle on Earth orbit. This unique property was proved by two specialists and one monkey in the Bottom Gear program. According to the leaders, the first problems only showed the potential of the operation and give hope for a much better cosmic future.
